readable.title: 3260975858_75d0612a69
readable.content: A dog sledding team pulling a man wearing a bright orange jacket in the snow . A man in an orange snowsuit is on a dogsled in the snow . A man is in a dog sled race with snow on the ground . A pack of sled dogs pulling a sled through a town . Dogs lead a sled with a man in an orange parka through the snow .
